serviceDescriptionIdentification.serviceDescriptionTitle: Winter Weather Precipitation Type over an area

informationService.name: Winter Weather Precipitation Type over an area
informationService.serviceAbstract: Winter Weather Precipitation type over an area -service is an ensemble forecast for precipitation type over the Europe area at the surface level. It is post-processed information from ECMWF input data and it is intended to air traffic planner, airport maintenance, air traffic control, airlines and pilots to help and prepare for Winter weather conditions. Ensemble forecast has 6 classes for precipitation: snow (solid), sleet (solid and liquid), rain (liquid), drizzle (liquid, small droplets), freezing drizzle  (liquid, small drops, below freezing point) and  freezing rain (liquid, below freezing point). The probability of precipitation is expressed as a percentage. Presipitation types can be called all at once or in desired groups or individually.

serviceProvision.providerDescription: FMI is the designated aeronautical meteorological service provider for Helsinki FIR as designated by the Ministry of Transport and Communications of Finland and as certified by Finnish Transport and Communications Agency.
serviceProvision.serviceSupport: For Incidents on services in operation, contact the Service desk [24/7]: +358 29 539 2580 or e-mail: operposti@fmi.fi

pointOfContact.name: Custome Services Aviation and Military
pointOfContact.description: to request access to the service, send an e-mail to ilmailu@fmi.fi

pointOfContact.name: service support
pointOfContact.description: For any issues related to the operation of Winter Weather Precipitation type service

geospatialCategorisation.description: The product covers the area between 22.00° N to 70.00° N and 25.00° W to 45.00° E, with a horizontal resolution 16 km x 16 km. This includes Europe and Part of North Atlantic and northern Africa.

operationalNeed.name: Operational context
operationalNeed.description: Precipitation type service fills the need to retrieve information about weather phenomena for flight planning and total airport management. No IER was used

functionality.name: Download Winter Weather Presipitation Type over an area
functionality.description: Allow the service consumer to retrieve presipitation type ensemble forecast information in the European domaine in GRIB2 format

accessAndUseCondition.name: Use the apikey
accessAndUseCondition.description: The access to the service is based on the apikey in request comand

accessAndUseCondition.name: SLA
accessAndUseCondition.description: The access to the service is subject to the signature of a Service Level Agreement with FMI

qualityOfService.name: Response time for maximum area (European domine)

validation.description: The service producton is according to ISO9001:2015.

informationDefinition.name: Service Information Definition
informationDefinition.description: The interface for the service is provided as a GRIB download service via HTTP and it is described fully in Github: https://github.com/fmidev/smartmet-plugin-download/wiki/SmartMet-plugin-download

securityMechanism.name: TLSv 1.2
securityMechanism.description: The service relies on TLSv 1.2 to provide integrity and confidentiality.

serviceMonitoring.monitoringDescription: The service is monitored, however there is no monitoring interface provided to the consumers

serviceInterface.name: WinterWeather Presipition Type over an area interface
serviceInterface.description: The interface for the service is provided as a GRIB2 download service via HTTP and it is described fully in Github: https://github.com/fmidev/smartmet-plugin-download/wiki/SmartMet-plugin-download
serviceInterface.interfaceBindingDescription: The interface for the service is provided as a GRIB download service via HTTP. Message exchange pattern is request-response type. Typically the user makes a request to the server and in response gets a GRIB file.

endPoint.name: Production Service Endpoint
endPoint.description: The service is available for consumption for operational usage at this endpoint. Note that the user must set the apikey into the url command at place /APEKEY/

operation.name: Presipitation Type Ensemble Forecast over an area
operation.description: TÄHÄN KUVAUS MITÄ TUOTEEN TILAUKSESSA TAPAHTUU JA KUVAUS MIKÄ ON KYSELYN VASTAUS

processingConsideration.name: Historic time values constraint
processingConsideration.description: The operation does not accept time values in the past

operationMessage.name: presipitationTypeForecastToAPointRequest
operationMessage.description: Message which provides the presipitation type forecast for a single point i.e. single airport.

operationMessage.name: presipitationTypeForecastToAPointResponse
operationMessage.description: Message which responds the validity of a previously sent TOBTSettingRequest message

operation.name: deleteTOBT
operation.description: The deleteTOBT Service Operation receives a request for deleting the Target Off-Block Time for a specific flight. The operation returns a confirmation of the validity of such request taking into account this business rule: Not accepting request affecting a flight with no Target Off-Block Time set yet.

operationMessage.name: TOBTDeleteRequest
operationMessage.description: Message which requests deleting the last TOBT value of the specified flight.

operationMessage.name: TOBTDeleteResponse
operationMessage.description: Message which responds the validity of a previously sent TOBTDeleteRequest message

behaviour.name: nominal behaviour
behaviour.description:
Each operation of the interface can be called independently.
